replies.bodyText: We don't maintain counts server side any longer. The clientside stuff just counts them as they come in.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: In the entityprovider, there used to be a call just to get the counts - that was what got short polled every 5 seconds. That call is no longer happening, so no cache needed.
replies.author: adrianfish
